content: President Biden: "I call on everyone, no matter how deeply they care about this decision, to keep all protests peaceful. Peaceful, peaceful, peaceful. No intimidation. Violence is never acceptable. Threats and intimidation are not speech."

name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: “Violence is never acceptable,” the powerful, wealthy man chided, as millions of people were condemned to forced birth policies. “Threats and intimidation are not speech,” he insisted, as millions of people were threatened with incarceration for the simple act of bodily control.
content.value:
“Violence is never acceptable,” the powerful, wealthy man chided, as millions of people were condemned to forced birth policies.

“Threats and intimidation are not speech,” he insisted, as millions of people were threatened with incarceration for the simple act of bodily control.
